title: Topic 001 Question 007
body: To reduce costs, the Director of Engineering has required all developers to move their development infrastructure resources from on-premises virtual machines

(VMs) to Google Cloud Platform. These resources go through multiple start/stop events during the day and require state to persist. You have been asked to design the process of running a development environment in Google Cloud while providing cost visibility to the finance department.
Which two steps should you take? (Choose two.)
options: Use the - -no-auto-delete flag on all persistent disks and stop the VM
Use the - -auto-delete flag on all persistent disks and terminate the VM
Apply VM CPU utilization label and include it in the BigQuery billing export
Use Google BigQuery billing export and labels to associate cost to groups
Store all state into local SSD, snapshot the persistent disks, and terminate the VM
Store all state in Google Cloud Storage, snapshot the persistent disks, and terminate the VM
